description: Try our easy to follow Ham & Mushroom Quiches recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Ham & Mushroom Quiches Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 180g leg ham off the bone, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. Line 6x7cm pie dishes with pastry, trimming off the excess. Prick base with fork. Place pie dishes onto a baking tray and bake for 15 minutes until golden. Remove from oven and reduce heat to 180°C.
Meanwhile, cook onion, ham and mushrooms until onion is soft. Divide between pie dishes. Whisk eggs with cream and parsley. Pour into cases and sprinkle with cheese.
Bake for 35 minutes until set and golden.
